title: Learn How to Set Up NEAR by Building a Hello World Smart Contract
description: In this course, you will learn how to set up NEAR by building a simple hello world application.

title: Learn NEAR Smart Contracts by Building a Word Guessing Game
description: In this course, you will learn more features of NEAR smart contracts while building a word guessing game.

title: Build a Sentence Making Smart Contract
description: In this integrated project, you test what you've learned by building a NEAR smart contract where you add words to a string, one at a time, to form a sentence.

title: Learn NEAR Accounts by Creating a Named Testnet Account
description: In this course, you will learn about NEAR accounts by creating your own testnet account.

title: Learn How to Interact with NEAR Programs Using the NEAR JavaScript API and Node
description: In this course, you will learn about the NEAR JavaScript API and how to use it to interact with programs stored on the NEAR blockchain

title: Build a Fortune Telling Smart Contract
description: In this integrated project, you will use your testnet account to create and deploy a smart contract that can tell your fortune. Then a Node client to interact with the contract.

title: Learn How to Integrate NEAR into an App
